DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare endoscopic radiofrequency ablation photodynamic therapy inoperable cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Endoscopic Radiofrequency Ablation Versus Photodynamic Therapy Inoperable Cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year old Pathologically radiologically confirm biliary malignant Inoperability stag Cholangiocarcinoma widespread metastasis Coagulopathy ( INR > 2.0 prothrombin time > 100 sec platelet count < 50,000 ) Prior SEMS placement Pregnancy Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status ≥ 3 ) Life expectancy < 3months
